content: so these were actually my first ever crochet patterns/creations i specifically started crocheting to be able to make toys for my boy s i have a car pattern and a tractor pattern as well and i will add those soonish this pattern is straight forward and won t take long at all and my eldest loves his diggerloader have fun and please ask if you have any questions note the little orange light has been left out of the pattern sorry instructions can be found on my blog xx
